bonus: Published apps on the App Store.
aboutYou: Team player with excellent communication skills.
Proactive attitude towards learning and adopting new technologies.
responsibilities: Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform using Kotlin.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application.
Stay updated on emerging technologies in mobile development.
reqs: Strong understanding of iOS SDK, different versions of iOS, and how to deal with different screen sizes.
Expierence with RESTful APIs to connect iOS apps to back-end services.
Familiarity with continuous integration and version control systems(Git & Github).
